fixes: Eliminated hard-coded version numbers across multiple files
Fixed inconsistent version references between app.js, sw.js, and manifest.json
Removed fallback hard-coded versions in management.js and other modules
Centralized all version information to a single source of truth
Added automatic version checking to the deployment process
Fixed documentation maintenance process and archiving
filesModified: docs/PROJECT_DOCUMENTS.md - UPDATED: Documentation inventory and rules
js/version-loader.js - NEW: Centralized module for version information
scripts/version-sync.js - NEW: Automatic version synchronization script
scripts/version-scan.js - NEW: Deep scanner for hard-coded versions
js/app.js - UPDATED: Now uses version-loader for version information
js/management.js - UPDATED: Removed hard-coded version fallbacks
js/ux-enhancements.js - UPDATED: Uses version-loader for help screen
js/reports.js - UPDATED: Uses version-loader for export version
sw.js - UPDATED: Dynamic cache version with auto-update

test-runner.js - ENHANCED: Added version consistency tests

impact: Establishes a robust documentation and version management system. Implements comprehensive documentation rules, automated version synchronization, and clear archiving processes. Ensures all files refer to the same version number and maintains consistent documentation standards across the project. Improves code maintenance, deployment reliability, and project organization.
